name: B A S E M E N T
description: Do you like to tickle nerves? Then this game is for you. Atmospheric rooms, nice graphics, with one very big mystery in the game B A S E M E N T. Notes that will immerse you in story history, sudden frights and discharging lights. All you need is to get out of the basement, I doubt that you can do it.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 560 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and later Processor: 3.1 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
